name: Ocean Lost Mysterious World: Hidden Object
name_original: Ocean Lost Mysterious World: Hidden Object
description:
Looking for mysteries to solve? Free Hidden Objects Ocean Game sends you under the sea to explore new puzzles and uncover secrets hidden by the mermaids and their sea animal friends. What mysterious things lie hidden in this watery world? There's only one way to find out.
The mermaids and other sea animals have plenty of secret puzzles they'd like to remain a mystery, but if you're going to escape this marine world, you've got to solve them. There are many kinds of levels to complete as you progress through the game, including word, pictures and silhouettes. Picture stages give you images of the items you need to find, whereas silhouette stages only give you an outline. The hardest puzzles give you a list of words and challenge you to seek out the objects without knowing what they look like.

The sea is a wondrous place full of mysteries and secrets. Work with the mermaids and other marine animals to solve puzzles and escape this strange, surreal place.

Features:
- Explore the sea one level at a time.
- Interact with marine animals in each level.
- Work with the mermaids to uncover their long lost secrets.
- Two types of hints.

How to Play:
- Look carefully at each screen as you try to locate items.
- Tap an item to collect it, solving another piece of the mystery.
- If you get stuck, you can use hints to help you out.
